phrases: I am the magician of the forest.
Let us see, that is not right.
I am just trying to make you feel comfortable.
Those guys will not come inside.
Can you tell me why you can see them?
Besides, none of the wicked ones can get in here.
Or rather, I do not let them in.
Everyone is busy with their books.
No one's going to hurt you.
Let us see if I have a good one.
It is been a very long time since anyone's come here.
I hope I have a book you might like.
Or, should I say, a book that likes you?
I am sorry for barging in.
You do not need to worry about that.
Give me a second, just a second!
You are going to need it to come back.
Make sure you do not lose it.
You are going to run straight through there.
Why do not you put your phone down when someone is talking to you?
Do you know what I go through every day?
I am tired, too, you know.
I am the one taking care of her!
You are the one who took her in just to be nice.
Daiki, hurry up and get ready.
It is your fault that Mom's...
You have your library card, right?
as long as you have this card, you are a member here.
You can come whenever you want, and you can borrow the books.
Only one at a time, however.
And you must never leave the front door open.
Mind those rules, and you can come here every day, if you like.
As often as you like, as long as you like.
No, we cannot deal with her anymore.
My wife left with the kids.
We have done enough for her, have not we?
It is your turn to take her, now.
You are a real bookworm now, huh?
I can forget all my problems while I am reading.
Hatori-san, if you would like, why do not you stay
I still cannot decide which one to do my book report on.
Even after you have read so many?
Well, I liked all of them.
I love reading the last page of a book more than anything.
You have to leave for today.
Will not your mom be worried if you do not come home soon?
It is all my fault, though...
I keep noticing the weird things,
Let us find a book for your report.
I just really did not want to go home that day.
That you would be so insistent.
As long as this is not hard on you.
And that became a special night.
There is a book I want you to have.
I have a feeling you really need this book.
Now, will you clean up these books for me?
The lonely little star, the tiny child of a star, twinkled in the empty sky all by itself.
I will send her home before sunrise.
You will never come back again.
Promise you will give it back.
I did not close the door.
Hatori Chise-san, I need you to do something for me.
The girl runs onward, holding with her a young man's regret.
Not knowing what she will find...
